pageContext.claim: “We've been endorsed by all of your sheriffs. You have sheriffs, you have great tough sheriffs. I know many of them. But the sheriffs, we had a big ceremony two months ago in Florida.”
pageContext.analysis: A majority of sheriffs in Florida, 48 of 66, endorsed Trump but that is not “all of the sheriffs,” as the president boasts. The sheriff in Portland endorsed Biden.
